mutants.code:
def add_min_chars_to_make_palindrome(str1: str) -> int:
    size = len(str1)
    ans = 1
    i = 0
    j = size - 1
    while i <= j:
        if str1[i] == str1[j]:
            i += 1
            j -= 1
        else:
            ans += 1
            i = 0
            j = size - 1 - ans
    return ans

    return ans
